248670.<pipipi_mid>\n「おいおい 何 言ってんだ。\n この道標の目標は:
<pipipi_mid>Hey, hey, what are you... We've already
cleared the target on this beacon, okay?<end>

248671.<pipipi_mid>\n「おお！\n この目標は クリアしたんだな！\n さ:
<pipipi_mid>Oh! I see you've cleared this target! That's
what I'm talking about.<pc> You're good! That's what I'm talking about!
All right, let's get you paid.<end>

248672.<pipipi_mid>\n「道標の目標を確認するんだな。\n 見事クリアしてた:
<pipipi_mid>I'll check the targets on the signposts... If
you successfully complete it, you'll be
rewarded!<end>

248673.<pipipi_mid>\n「……んー？ なんか おかしいな。\n ちょっと 問:
<pipipi_mid>... Hmm? Something's wrong... There seems to
be a problem, so I'm sorry, but I'll come
back in a while...<end>

248674.<pipipi_mid>\n「極致への道標について 何が知りたいんだ？\n<br:
<pipipi_mid>What do you want to know about the signpost
to extremis?<break>

248675.<pipipi_mid>\n「極致への道標ってのは\n 冒険者を 強さの極致へと:
Signposts of Perfection are meant to guide adventurers to the ultimate in strength. When the adventurer has achieved one goal, the
signpost will point him to the next. Repetition will eventually lead you to the ultimate... It was once part of a skill
master's training... It was lost to the ancient world, but I've recreated it in my own way. What do you think? I'm sure you've been wanting to see the ultimate, haven't you? It might be a little tough, but I'll lead you right to it...
Anyway, give it a try!

248676.<pipipi_mid>\n「具体的には 俺に話しかけたときの\n <pc>の:
Specifically, when you spoke to me If the strength of the target is greater than the target of the guidepost, then yes... In that condition, if you select the signpost
and report back to me, you will receive the prize... And then you're ready to take on the next goal... I've got little rewards for you,
and even higher ranks for you, so keep trying! Also, if you ever need to check on a target or report on a target when I'm not
around, you can use the beacon memo from the important stuff... If you're in a safe place, like inside a town, you can write down your
goals and report your achievements. But you'll have to pick up your reward in person...

248677.<pipipi_mid>\n「極致への道標に 挑戦するんなら\n 何をしたいか:
<pipipi_mid>If you're going to challenge the signposts to
extremes, you're going to have to tell me
what you want!<break>

248678.<pipipi_mid>\n「この道標には まだ挑戦できないぜ。\n 順番に 挑:
These guideposts are yet to be challenged... They'll be available in order of challenge, so first, you need to complete the target
you're trying to reach...

248679.<pipipi_mid>\n「他に 何か 用はあるか？\n<break>: <pipipi_mid>Is there anything else I can do for you?<break>

248681.<pipipi_mid>\n「おお すげぇな！\n この目標 クリアしちまったの:
Oh, my God! I'm gonna clear this target. Okay, here's your reward. Oh, my God. You have so much stuff. I'm gonna go get my stuff
together, and then we'll come back...

248691.<pipipi_off>不明なエラーが 発生しました。\nしばらくしてから やり:
<pipipi_off>I'm getting an unknown error. Please try
again in a few minutes.<pipipi_on><end>

248706.<pipipi_mid>\n「……マジかよ。\n すべてのランクを クリアしちま:
... Ma... We've cleared all ranks... There are no more signposts left... The signposts are looking for a new target... They're
looking for new targets, harder targets. Just wait and see...

248707.<pipipi_mid>\n「よし 次の道標が 示されたぜ。\n 今度も がんば: <pipipi_mid>Okay, the next marker... Good luck this time!<end>

248708.「<%sL_RANK>を\n 全部 クリアしちまったんだな。\n<br>\n「次:
I've cleared all of <%sL_RANK>... Let's get
to the next <%sL_NXT_RANK>!<end>

248714.<pipipi_mid>\n「なんだ もう おしまいか？\n まあ いいや。また:
<pipipi_mid>What, are we done here? Well... You'll have
to come back!<end>

249136.<pipipi_off>この条件を 満たした状態で\nダーマ神殿にいる ディエゴ:
<pipipi_off>With these conditions met, let's go see Diego
at the Alltrades Abbey!<end>

<pipipi_off><pc> is <%sL_DAIJI_ITEM>... I don't have any
immediate goals that I can try...<end>

249138.<pipipi_off><pc>は <%sL_DAIJI_ITEM>を使った。\:

comes to mind, marked by a signpost to the
extreme...<end>

249215.<pipipi_mid>\n「この道標に示された目標には\n まだ 達してないみ:
<pipipi_mid>I don't think I've reached the goal that's
marked on this sign. I'll write it down for
you. Look at it.<end>

249966.<select_se_off>\n極致への道標について\n具体的な内容について\:
<select_se_off>
About Signposts to the Extreme
Specifics
If you have more than one goal
About the food
<select_end>
<break>

250546.道標に記された目標を\nコミュニケーションウィンドウの システムログに\n書き込:
Write the goals listed in the guideposts to
the system log in the communication window...<end>

250548.<pipipi_mid>\n「今までに示された道標は 全部クリアしてるな。\n:
I've cleared all the milestones you've given me so far... Until we find a new target, all we can do is check the status. I'm sure the
next marker will appear soon, so please be patient...

250632.<pipipi_mid>\n「道標が示す目標は ひとつだけじゃなく\n 最大ＨＰ:
There's more than just one target that's marked by a signpost, there's also things like maximum HP and attack power... And
sometimes they require you to be a certain profession or have a certain weapon equipped... I know it's a bit of a hassle,
but in that case, just make sure you meet all the requirements and your strength is above the target, then report back to me... I've
been told that in order to reach the ultimate goal, you need to acquire a variety of strengths. It could be an endless
challenge...

250634.<pipipi_mid>\n「道標が示す目標は あくまで\n 冒険者自身の 本来:
The guideposts indicate goals that must be surpassed by the adventurer's own natural strength and the equipment he uses. I'll
allow changes in strength that disappear after a certain amount of time, like the effects of eating food... If you're a little
short of your goal, you might want to rethink the alchemy effect or try synthesizing accessories...

250996.<pipipi_mid>\n「よう <pc>。\n いいところに 来てくれたぜ！:
Yo, ! Nice to see you.
Why don't you join me for a little training? This is the Road to Perfection, and is meant to guide you to the height of your abilities.
It's easy to explain. First, I'll show you the different Roads you can take and the challenges each one has.
If the specified stat is equal to or higher than the challenge's target stat value, you'll clear it.
Each time you complete a challenge, the next one'll open up. Keep this up, and you'll eventually reach the ultimate challenge.
So, whadd'ya think? Don't you want to reach that ultimate challenge too, ?

250998.<pipipi_mid>\n「それと 極致への道標には\n つよさ 職業 武器の:
Also, there are three guideposts to mastery... Strength, Profession, and Weapon. The strength guideposts simply require you to
complete a goal, but the occupation and weapon guideposts require you to meet specific occupation and weapon requirements
to complete. And then there's the challenge to reach the ultimate in strength. A challenge to the best of the best... a
challenge to the strength of the greatest heroes of all time. But this goal is really hard, and it's only a challenge... You don't
have to do it. It's... So I'll give you this so you can check your goals and report back to me whenever you want.

251000.<pipipi_mid>\n「ソイツを見たいときは だいじなものから\n 使って:
If you want to see it, just start with the most important one and you're good to go. If you want to know more about it, just select
"Ask me about it." I'll give you a lecture any time. Okay, let's get this over with.

286122.<pipipi_mid>\n「よう <pc>。 来たな。\n あれから 俺も修行:
be exalted ... ... Since then, I've trained myself... I've unlocked a new stage on the path to perfection! But the ones we've been trying have been renamed strength signposts, and there are new occupational and weapon signposts. The new
guideposts include specific professions and weapons as targets... They're tough, but they're also rewarding. And the challenge of
becoming the greatest of them all. Now you can challenge the strength of the greatest heroes of all time. However, this goal is
really hard, and it's only a challenge. There's no need to push yourself.

286124.<pipipi_mid>\n「……っと。 あとそうだ 道標メモ。\n 渡した だ:
..... And yes, the road... I gave it to you. It's very important. I'll free up a bit of energy here too... We can use the signpost
memo to report the achievement from anywhere in town... Well, in that case, I can't give you the reward... I... What? You want to get
your reward from the memo? No, no, no. I'll give it to you in person. I'm sorry, but you'll have to come to me. I'm sorry, but
this is all I have to say. Let's get this over with, shall we?

286126.<pipipi_mid>\n「おっ！ 最強の極致に挑戦するんだな。\n お前もチ:
<pipipi_mid>Whoa! I challenge the best of the best...
You're a challenger... I don't know. Which
one will you challenge?<end>

286128.<pipipi_mid>\n「おお……！ この最強の極致を\n 全部 クリアしち:
<pipipi_mid>Oh...! I can't believe you've managed to
clear all of this... As expected...<pc> Yeah!<end>

286130.<pipipi_mid>\n「道標は まだまだ残ってるから\n まあ 気長に が:
<pipipi_mid>The guideposts are still there, so please be
patient...<end>

286132.<pipipi_off>\n最強の極致に挑戦の <%sL_RANK>を\nすべて:
<pipipi_off>You've completed all <%sL_RANK> of the most
extreme challenges!<me_71>
<end>

286134.<pipipi_mid>\n「おいおいおい マジかよ……。\n 最強の極致だぜ？:
<pipipi_mid>Whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa, whoa,
whoa. You're the best of the best! You're
really the strongest, clearing everything!<end>

286136.<pipipi_off>\n最強の極致への挑戦 すべての道標をクリアした！\nこ:
A challenge to the strongest extremity. All the milestones have been cleared! It's outrageous that you've cleared all of these!
Congratulations on your accomplishment!Wait for the next signpost in our quest for the ultimate in power...

287431.<pipipi_mid>\n「念のため もっかい伝えとくが\n このメモでできる:

with this note is report it... Well...<end>

287435.<pipipi_mid>\n「おお！\n この目標は クリアしたんだな！\n さ:
Oh! I see you've cleared this target! That's what I'm talking about. You're good!! I want to give you your reward in

287541.<pipipi_mid>\n「よう <pc>。 俺だ ディエゴだ。\n いきなり:
be exalted It's me. It's me, Di... I heard a voice out of nowhere, and I was startled... You look... Well, I can't see... So, I was wondering if

287543.<pipipi_off>\n真のダーマ神殿にいる\nディエゴのところへ 行ってみ: <pipipi_off>Go to Diego in the true Alltrades Abbey...<end>
